message.name: ERR_PARTICIPANTSEARCH_UNIMPLEMENTED
message.locale: No Participant Search implemented. Please contact an Administrator.

message.name: ERR_PARTICIPANTSEARCH_FV_NAME_SHORT
message.locale: Name field must contain at least %1n alphanumeric characters.

message.name: ERR_PARTICIPANTSEARCH_FV_REGISTERED_NAME_SHORT
message.locale: Registered Name field must contain at least %1n alphanumeric characters.

message.name: ERR_PARTICIPANTSEARCH_XRV_MAXIMUM
message.locale: The maximum search result has been exceeded. Please refine your search.
